games.summary: DENVER -- —Kevin Durantscored 31 points,Reed Sheppardscored the final 11 points of the third quarter to blow open a close game, and theHouston Rocketsrolled past theDenver Nuggets115-101 on Saturday. Nikola Jokicled Denver with 25 points andJamal Murrayscored 16.
